name: Broken Hearts In the Dreamland
description:
In this tiny Isekai-like game you play as Steve, a nerdy guy that woke up in a dreamland... or perhaps... a former dreamland?  

The triplet queens are gone and Steve is the only person that can bring them back... before he lose himself to this paradise lost place.

Commands:

Movement: W, A, S, D and Mouse

Interaction: [E]

Inventory: [I]

Jump / Advance dialogs: [Space]

This project was built as a challenge for the #devtober 2022 game jam, and it is more of a concept mixing some ideas. We hope you like it and have a good time playing this game.

Greetings and until next time. The Star Travellers.

--

Credits/Thanks to:

Please check out the credits session inside of the game.
